title: hide and seek on sr
body:
i dont see why not anyway because the minions can be timers and when they get to a inhib or T3 tower it would be game over as long as its not touched and there are more spots and i would rather hide on sr then the crystal star
i feel the crystal star map is getting a bit old and not very fun anymore

thoughts??

replies.body: I agree that hide n seek is a fun game, but on SR, it's too big and take way too long to find people. Trolls will be more likely to ruin games as well (push and backdoor). If this was the case it would be 5 seekers, 4 hunters instead.
Still won't protect you from TF/Rammus.
it's too big of a map and turrets.
